properties.areaDesc: Tippah, MS; Alcorn, MS; Benton, MS; Prentiss, MS; McNairy, TN
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 6:09AM CST until January 11 at 7:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Tippah County in northeastern Mississippi...
Eastern Benton County in northeastern Mississippi...
Northern Prentiss County in northeastern Mississippi...
Alcorn County in northeastern Mississippi...
Southeastern McNairy County in western Tennessee...

* Until 700 AM CST.

* At 609 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of
Ripley, moving northeast at 40 mph.

HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to
mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings.

* Locations impacted include...
Corinth, Booneville, Ripley, Blue Mountain, Jumpertown, Glen,
Thrashers, Hinkle, Burton, Theo, Gravestown, Farmington, Walnut,
Falkner, Dumas, Guys, Rienzi, Kossuth, Chalybeate and Murry.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CST for northeastern
Mississippi...and western Tennessee.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to
flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
